Recommended requirements:

  • Operating system: Windows XP Service Pack 3, Vista Service Pack, 7 or higher.
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 at 2.4 GHz or equivalent processor.
  • Memory: 4 GB of memory. (2GB minimum)
  • Graphics card: nVIDIA GeForce 6600 or ATI Radeon X1300. Pixel / Vertex Shader 3.0 with 128 MB of VRAM. Compatible with DirectX 9.0c

Story:

The night of April 23 was quiet and cheerful, until in a building where civilians lived a disturbance was heard in room 13 where a lady and her daughter lived, screaming and screaming sounds were heard until something came out of the apartment window. Unfortunately it was the very mutilated lady .. after a few seconds something comes out of the same window and takes the corpse (or what is left of it) to the bottom of nearby sewers, there was no time or reaction for civilians to witness a scene so terrifying. Immediately 911 has been called and the Venezuelan Intelligence Corps came in less than 20 minutes and inserted fences to remove civilians from the sewer system, the girl was taken to a hospital because she was seriously injured. The head of the Intelligence Corps Pablo Maldonado, assumed that the scene should be interpreted in a discreet and cautious way, the information given by the witnesses to claim that he was not an armed person was enough for him to give this for an intermediate situation of an aggressive suspect with mental problems so he has asked his best agent Edgar Lopez to resort to the case, and with great caution find the thug.
